S

sentenceCount - Variable in class concordance.ConcordanceBuilder
 
setContextRef(int) - Method in class concordance.IndexItem
Set the sentence context reference for this IndexItem.
The context for a index word or phrase is the first sentence in which it appears in the source text file.
This field references an element in the contexts list of the Concordance in which the sentence has been placed.
setUp() - Method in class concordanceTest.ConcordanceBuilderTest
Creates an arbitrary ConcordanceBuilder for use in each test.
setUp() - Method in class concordanceTest.ConcordanceTest
Constructs an arbitrary Concordance for use in each test.
